body_html:
Sure, here are a few options:

  1. Use masked_fill_
  2. Use a combination of masked_select and masked_copy_

For 3 and 4, I think there is no significant slowdown for this case compared to 0.3, so you can still use it.

And we are aware of those slowdowns, they are being tracked in #5673 (comment)

Thanks!
body_text:
Sure, here are a few options:

Use masked_fill_
Use a combination of masked_select and masked_copy_

For 3 and 4, I think there is no significant slowdown for this case compared to 0.3, so you can still use it.
And we are aware of those slowdowns, they are being tracked in #5673 (comment)
Thanks!
body:
Sure, here are a few options:

1. Use `masked_fill_`
2. Use a combination of `masked_select` and `masked_copy_`

For 3 and 4, I think there is no significant slowdown for this case compared to 0.3, so you can still use it.

And we are aware of those slowdowns, they are being tracked in https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/5673#issuecomment-372980255 

Thanks!
